author: Indrek Lasn

comments.comment: GraphQL powered Node.js backend; Node.js express server with MongoDB and graphQL, all CRUD capability, simple frontend.
Electron desktop app; simple I/O application.
Instragram clone; grid management (CSS), multiple API endpoints (graphQL), can use Instagram's API.

Data visualization with D3.js; Data-Driven Documents, could also use ChartJS or plotly.JS, public data source - https://github.com/awesomedata/awesome-public-datasets, D3 workshop - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qVgOTbx4RW8.

description: List of projects to build up knowledge and portfolio.

quotes.quote: Nothing good comes easy. If it’s hard, it’s worth doing.

title: Want to be a top developer? You should build things. Here’s another list to get you started
